summary.p: The second volume of a 2-volume Pākavatam, that is, a Tamil prose version of the Bhāgavatapurāṇa. This Tamil version appears to be by Ciṉṉaiyavāttiyār, based on the Telugu version by Timmayyaṉ.
The first volume is BnF Indien 255.
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (**** 2023).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page (additional). No foliation. Verso blank.
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc:
A note, unrelated to the bundle, on a detached paper leaf:
N° 78.
Ce livre contient huitneuf traités de médecine dont 8 par Agastia & un par Konganavar, son disciple

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year kuṟōtaṉa of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1805-1806, 1745-1746, etc. See colophon (U2, f401r2). Dated to circa 1745 by Vinson (1866-1867) on the basis of the colophon and to 1745 by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, Département des Manuscrits, Inventaire 7 = dons : manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, n° 1 à 3306: no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 39, no. 254-255.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.

Vinson, Julien. 1866-1867. Catalogue tamoul. Handwritten descriptions of BnF manuscripts “Tamoul 4-496” (new shelfmark “Indien 4-496”). BnF Indien 1061 (nos. 4-132), BnF Indien 1062 (nos. 133-204), BnF Indien 577 (nos. 205-496). — See BnF Indien 577, f. 60r, no. 238-239 254-255.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
